languages.text: {n}Плоть покрыта глубокими ожогами, вокруг {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментов{/g} кожа спеклась в черный уголь. На священном железе выцарапаны богохульные заклинания, складывающиеся в литании нечестивого мусорного кода. Удивительно, насколько стойкими оказались системы жизнеобеспечения этого техножреца, удерживающие искру жизни в израненном теле.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Плоть покрыта глубокими ожогами, вокруг {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментов{/g} кожа спеклась в черный уголь. На священном железе выцарапаны богохульные заклинания, складывающиеся в литании нечестивого мусорного кода. Удивительно, насколько стойкими оказались системы жизнеобеспечения этого техножреца, удерживающие искру жизни в израненном теле.{/n}

languages.text: {n}There are deep burns all over his flesh, and the skin around his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} is charred. Blasphemous spells have been carved into his sacred iron, forming unholy litanies of scrap-code. It is amazing how robust this Tech-Priest's life support systems have proven to be in maintaining the spark of life in his grievously wounded body.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sein gesamtes Fleisch ist übersät mit tiefen Brandwunden, und die Haut um seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g} herum ist verkohlt. Blasphemische Zauber wurden in sein heiliges Eisen geritzt. Sie ergeben unheilige Litaneien von Schadcode. Die Lebenserhaltungssysteme dieses Techpriesters müssen erstaunlich robust sein, immerhin haben sie in seinem schwer verwundeten Körper den Funken des Lebens am Glimmen gehalten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are deep burns all over his flesh, and the skin around his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} is charred. Blasphemous spells have been carved into his sacred iron, forming unholy litanies of scrap-code. It is amazing how robust this Tech-Priest's life support systems have proven to be in maintaining the spark of life in his grievously wounded body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein gesamtes Fleisch ist übersät mit tiefen Brandwunden, und die Haut um seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g} herum ist verkohlt. Blasphemische Zauber wurden in sein heiliges Eisen geritzt. Sie ergeben unheilige Litaneien von Schadcode. Die Lebenserhaltungssysteme dieses Techpriesters müssen erstaunlich robust sein, immerhin haben sie in seinem schwer verwundeten Körper den Funken des Lebens am Glimmen gehalten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il porte de graves brûlures sur tout le corps et la peau de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétiques{/g} est calcinée. Des sortilèges blasphématoires ont été gravés dans son fer sacré, formant des litanies impies d'anticode. Il est étonnant de voir à quel point ses systèmes de survie se sont avérés robustes, parvenant à maintenir une étincelle de vie dans un corps si gravement atteint.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are deep burns all over his flesh, and the skin around his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} is charred. Blasphemous spells have been carved into his sacred iron, forming unholy litanies of scrap-code. It is amazing how robust this Tech-Priest's life support systems have proven to be in maintaining the spark of life in his grievously wounded body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il porte de graves brûlures sur tout le corps et la peau de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétiques{/g} est calcinée. Des sortilèges blasphématoires ont été gravés dans son fer sacré, formant des litanies impies d'anticode. Il est étonnant de voir à quel point ses systèmes de survie se sont avérés robustes, parvenant à maintenir une étincelle de vie dans un corps si gravement atteint.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他全身上下遍布着深深的烧伤，{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}周围的皮肤也烧焦了。亵渎的咒语刻在他的圣铁上，构成了一串不洁的废码。令人惊讶的是，这位技术神甫的生命维持系统似乎十分顽强。尽管他受了重伤，但他的身体依然亮着生命的火花。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are deep burns all over his flesh, and the skin around his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} is charred. Blasphemous spells have been carved into his sacred iron, forming unholy litanies of scrap-code. It is amazing how robust this Tech-Priest's life support systems have proven to be in maintaining the spark of life in his grievously wounded body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他全身上下遍布着深深的烧伤，{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}周围的皮肤也烧焦了。亵渎的咒语刻在他的圣铁上，构成了一串不洁的废码。令人惊讶的是，这位技术祭司的生命维持系统似乎十分顽强。尽管他受了重伤，但他的身体依然亮着生命的火花。{/n}

languages.text: {n}男の肉体のあちこちに深い火傷があって、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}周辺の皮膚は焦げていた。冒涜するような呪文がその神聖な鉄に刻まれて、破壊コードの不浄な連祷の言葉を記している。ひどく傷を負った体なのに命の火花がまだ輝いている。この技術司祭の生命維持システムがこれほど頑丈なのは驚くべきことだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are deep burns all over his flesh, and the skin around his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} is charred. Blasphemous spells have been carved into his sacred iron, forming unholy litanies of scrap-code. It is amazing how robust this Tech-Priest's life support systems have proven to be in maintaining the spark of life in his grievously wounded body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男の肉体のあちこちに深い火傷があって、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}周辺の皮膚は焦げていた。冒涜するような呪文がその神聖な鉄に刻まれて、破壊コードの不浄な連祷の言葉を記している。ひどく傷を負った体なのに命の火花がまだ輝いている。この技術司祭の生命維持システムがこれほど頑丈なのは驚くべきことだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tiene quemaduras profundas en toda la carne, y la piel alrededor de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}auméticos{/g} está carbonizada. En su hierro sagrado se han grabado hechizos blasfemos, formando impías letanías de código chatarra. Es increíble lo robustos que han resultado ser los sistemas de soporte vital de este tecnosacerdote, que mantienen la chispa de la vida en su cuerpo gravemente herido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are deep burns all over his flesh, and the skin around his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} is charred. Blasphemous spells have been carved into his sacred iron, forming unholy litanies of scrap-code. It is amazing how robust this Tech-Priest's life support systems have proven to be in maintaining the spark of life in his grievously wounded body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tiene quemaduras profundas en toda la carne, y la piel alrededor de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}auméticos{/g} está carbonizada. En su hierro sagrado se han grabado hechizos blasfemos, formando impías letanías de código chatarra. Es increíble lo robustos que han resultado ser los sistemas de soporte vital de este tecnosacerdote, que mantienen la chispa de la vida en su cuerpo gravemente herido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adamın vücudunda derin yanıklar bulunuyor, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetiklerinin{/g} çevresindeki deri de dağlanmış. Kutsal demirine kazınmış olan kâfirce büyüler, hurda kodundan uğursuz dualar oluşturmuş. Tekno Rahip'in yaşam destek sisteminin gücü, gerçekten takdire şayan. Adam, bedeninin aldığı ağır hasara rağmen yaşam kıvılcımını korumayı başarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are deep burns all over his flesh, and the skin around his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} is charred. Blasphemous spells have been carved into his sacred iron, forming unholy litanies of scrap-code. It is amazing how robust this Tech-Priest's life support systems have proven to be in maintaining the spark of life in his grievously wounded body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etinde derin yanıklar bulunuyor, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetik{/g}lerinin çevresindeki deri de dağlanmış gibi görünüyor. Kutsal demirine kazınmış olan kâfirce büyüler, hurda kodu oluşturmuş. Bu Tekno Rahip'in yaşam destek sisteminin gücü, gerçekten takdire şayan. Bedeninin aldığı ağır hasara rağmen yaşam kıvılcımını korumayı başarıyor.{/n}
